member.name: T:Zero.Abp.AspNetCore.Components.Messages.UiMessageOptions
member.summary: Options to override message dialog appearance.

member.name: P:Zero.Abp.AspNetCore.Components.Messages.UiMessageOptions.CenterMessage
member.summary: If true, the message dialogue will be centered on the screen.

member.name: P:Zero.Abp.AspNetCore.Components.Messages.UiMessageOptions.ShowMessageIcon
member.summary: If true, the message dialogue will show the large icon for the current message type.

member.summary: Custom text for the Ok button.

member.name: P:Zero.Abp.AspNetCore.Components.Messages.UiMessageOptions.OkButtonIcon
member.summary: Custom icon for the Ok button.

member.summary: Custom text for the Cancel button.

member.name: P:Zero.Abp.AspNetCore.Components.Messages.UiMessageOptions.CancelButtonIcon
member.summary: Custom icon for the Cancel button.

member.name: T:Zero.Abp.AspNetCore.Components.Messages.UiMessageType
member.summary: Defines the possible ui message types with predefined actions.
